S. Korean Delegation Arrives Here
   Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Northeast Asia Peace Committee of the Uri Party of south Korea led by Member of Parliament Kim Hyok Gyu arrived here on Wednesday at the invitation of the National Reconciliation Council of the DPRK.
